name: map-events
description: All JS events mapped out, across every browser.

scripts.echo: echo "Success: Results of Lints in Above Lines" && exit 0
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run jshint
scripts.test-verbose: npm run eslint && npm run jshint && npm run echo
scripts.test-silent: npm run eslint && npm run jshint && npm run echo && npm run clear

author: galpx, alexwiegmanpx
